title: Plz Help, Login Error Patch 5.9
body:
I need help logging in.
First problem it says ''did not receive a response from the server'' something like that.
Then this pops up
**''The login server did not respond. You may have a connection issue that is not related to the League Of Legends server. See our current status here.''** ''Website link''
Then is says
**''If you are still unable to connect, please check the following knowledge.''   ''Another website link''**
Lastly
**Still unable to connect, Contact player support at lolsupport.com**

_I tried what it says on the websites but i still cant log on and keeps ''not receiving a response from the server''
Please someone help me fix this problem_

replies.body:
What OS are you on, and who's your ISP?

Have you experienced this problem in the past, or was it only recent?

This is the first time this problem has happened for me. 
The problem happened after the 5.9 patch. I can launch the client but it wont let me log in.
Im with optus (cable) and i am running windows 7 on my hp desktop'.

Firstly, disable any firewalls/anti-virus you may have and try again. If it's still failing, try uninstalling them.

If it's *still* not working, try [switching your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5). Remember that this requires a DNS cache flush and computer reset. Then try everything else [on that page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).

Best of luck.
